msg.msgText: The shared memory that is configured in the virtual Message Gateway server is too large.

msgExplanation.p: Message Gateway has detected a problem with store memory configuration, preventing it from starting properly. User may have decreased system memory allocated to the VM.

msgUserResponse.p: Either clean the store and restart the Message Gateway server, or change system memory to previous size and restart the Message Gateway server. If the problem persists, contact IBM support.
